results-comment: Do you have any feedback for us? Problems? Suggestions?
litw-more-title: If you enjoyed this study, there's more!
litw-more-step1: Visit and follow us on Facebook to learn about new studies:
litw-more-step2: Share this study with your friends!
litw-more-step3: And consider participating in some of our other studies:
litw-more-share-text: This is an interesting study about cats and the the dude.
litw-more-study-color-slogan1: Are you a super color perceiver?
litw-more-study-color-slogan3: Discover the kaleidoscope in your eyes!
litw-more-study-color-slogan4: Help us discover how people see color differently!
litw-more-study-color-slogan5: Do you see colors like others?
litw-more-study-color-slogan6: Shine a light on vision research!
litw-more-study-color-description: Test how old you are based on how well you can distinguish between colors!
litw-more-study-thinking-slogan2: Are you more like a scientist or a buddha?
litw-more-study-thinking-slogan6: Support research on the way we think!
litw-more-study-thinking-description: Find out how your thinking style compares to others.
litw-more-study-memory-slogan2: Help us build a roadmap of memory!
litw-more-study-memory-slogan3: Can you decode an alien language?
litw-more-study-memory-slogan5: How does your memory stack up to others?
litw-more-study-memory-slogan6: Contribute to our understanding of understanding!
litw-more-study-memory-description: Test how good you are at accumulating knowledge and experiences over time.
litw-more-study-crowding-slogan: How accurate is your peripheral vision?
litw-more-study-crowding-description: Are you curious about how accurate your peripheral vision is compared to others? Learn more about your visual perception by doing these fun tasks!
litw-more-study-privacy-iot-description: Find out how your data sharing behavior compares to others and learn about the Internet of Things.
litw-more-study-perceptual-models-slogan: Do you see websites like others?
litw-more-study-perceptual-models-descri: How do you perceive the colorfulness and visual complexity of websites?
litw-more-study-risk-preference-slogan: What is your natural risk preference?
litw-more-study-risk-preference-descript: Help us understand how people's natural risk tendency affects their behavior online. This experiment takes around 15 minutes.
